Gabe Lugreno is everything I avoid in a man. Heâ€™s arrogant, bossy, wealthy, andâ€¦American.Also, heâ€™s younger than me and wonâ€™t take no for an answer.When I give in to a casual fling, he soon learns I only take orders in the bedroom.
